body: @Feuerteufel How to Jinx 2022 in one sentence: Maybe they finally realized that their "Phase" has finally passed for good and what it left was a big embarrassment for years to come so they turned their head back and prepare for a new page full of Vanilla goodness.
A tksn with everyone surviving and no amputation or injuries .... give him/her one more year and he/she will be known as vanilla-ero-manga-master.
為什麼chipokan的作品少的可憐?畫風明明屌打其他人
